message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a good starting point, and we can adjust if you prefer a different distribution.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split, which is still generous considering the inflation working against me.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Inflation is hurting both of us.  I propose a 50/50 split to ensure we both get a fair share after the losses due to inflation. This is the most equitable way forward.
